data.text: Then I saw another great and marvelous sign in heaven: seven angels with the seven final plagues, because with them the wrath of God is completed.

I also saw something like a sea of glass mixed with fire, and those who had overcome 15:2 the beast, his image ¦ the image, the beast K BYZthe beast, his image, 15:2 and the number of his name ¦ and his mark, that is, the number of his name, Αν TRand the number of his name were standing by the sea of glass, holding 15:2 harps from ¦ the harps of K ANT BYZ HFharps from God.
They sang the song of Moses, the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb:
Who could not fear 15:4 yoʋ ¦ --- Αν ANT CTyoʋ, O Lord,
After this I looked, 15:5 and ¦ and behold, TRand the sanctuary of the tent of witness in heaven was opened,

and out 15:6 of the sanctuary ¦ of heaven PCK ¦ --- K BYZ HFof the sanctuary came the seven angels with the seven 15:6 plagues. They were ¦ plagues, CT TRplagues. They were clothed in pure bright 15:6 linen ¦ stone WHlinen, with golden sashes wrapped around their chests.
Then one of the four living creatures gave the seven angels seven golden bowls full of the wrath of God, who lives forever and ever.
And the temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God and from his power, and no one could enter the temple until the seven plagues of the 15:8 seven ¦ --- Αν PCKseven angels were completed.
